title: tirukkumaranAi
sahitya:
thirukkumaranAi avadharittAr tirukkayilai aghanru shivaguru AryAmbAL


anupallavi

  irukkumudhl catur maraigaL tazhaikka sakala
jagatguruvE shankara jaya jaya venrazhaikkat-


caraNam    nAsthikap-panjumalaiku shUrAvaLi ena narargaLil idhaya iruLara-ezhu shudarena asthika maDappayir shezhikka ezhu mukhilena Adi
antamillAda shivan kAlaDiyil andaNat-
                     (viruttam on karumAri)
1:  tirumAlin sOdariyE tiruvERkkADurai karuNai deivamE em
karumAriyena aDiyAr tirukkUTTam azhaikka aruL krSNamAri
aruLmAri poyyumighu ayarkkaNNAlE aDiyAr mana iruL mAya inba
 vAzhvaruLum engaL kula deivam nIyE
 caraNam 2    karumAri karumAriyena anbar kuzhAm pugazhndu tozha tiruvErKKATTil
 aruvamoDu uruvamAi vandoLittu nI kOyirkkoNDa vindai EdO paruvatarAjan
 pudalvi un padam paNi bhaktar bhaktivashamAi pUncOlai veruttalAmO
